728709f-a.title: Richmond: Clinton Place - Richmond Avenue
728709f-a.text:
Clinton Place (formerly Clinton Avenue), east from near Richrond Avenue, in the village of Port Richmond. View 1 shows the south side of the street; view 2 the north side. Clinton Place terminates at ::eherton Avenue.
About 1910
Views 1-2
By Mulford Simonson
From P. L. Sperr Collection
728709f-a.folder: Clinton Place & Richmond Avenue, Staten Island, NY
